title: Riot made a mission that is basically don't play Support
body:
https://image.prntscr.com/image/jQksGhRJSi66HutuGi9xdA.png

Like no main item a support gets is worth 2500 gold, and placing 4 wards in a game.... like how is that even a mission?

Your legitimately just giving us a mission that is a fuck you to supports.

replies.body:
I suppose the idea behind the ward aspect of the mission is to encourage players to use wards more frequently. Fact is, vision can often be a deciding factor in low elo games, so it makes sense to encourage people to be using them (it's not like people can't use them for free in the form of Trinkets).

Don't have a clue what the idea behind the other aspect of the mission is.
I mean... 4, you can't justify having just 4 be the number by low elo games being told to use them.

Eh you asked for it.

{{champion:202}} says otherwise.

{{champion:202}}  says 4 is perfection

Well, maybe the number is a bit low, Maybe it would be better off as 6 or 8, or even 10, but I think the idea is to just get people to start using wards a bit more often. I think you (and a few others) would agree that it can quite often be the case that people aren't warding at all in-game, even when they have a Warding Totem. It's, perhaps, a good starting point for the people who don't ward.
red's gold/item missions are easy in aram, just spam out like 4 games and be done with it.
Yeah, but it'd be nice to complete this in games where you can do both (buy items and use wards).
You can still build defensive (Armor and Magic Resist) as a Support, I don't see how building defensive being a problem for Support.
Yeah or you could build the proper support items that have resist (Locket for example.) and be a useful support.

Let's seeeee......Rylais. I guess Warmogs if you're playing Soraka, and Luden's if you're playing something like Lux. I like Liandry's but let's just say I wouldn't buy it in a ranked game. So pretty much just Rylais

I guess they want to make the missions somewhat unique form each other and I get that, but 12 items feels like a huge chore for a supp main. I like playing jungle every now and again but 12?

The wards are low, I guess it's enough to start developing habits for people that don't ward and be irrelevant for people that do, but the habit thing really only works if they continue with those sort of missions relatively frequently.

i mean...

Support Item + Locket + Redemption.

0 items above 2.5k.

Sorry but i like to play my support's with proper support items.
Ardent, even Chalice, all under. I think Stoneplate might be 2.6 but it's too weak to be worth the gold rn imo.
i mean hovering the item {{item:3193}} when selecting its image tells you the cost, shouldn't be guessing prices on the boards when they are provided
Didn't know boards showed the prices, and didn't know Stoneplate by heart cause I don't use it.
Stoneplate is 2.5 but not that great, honestly the only item i'd build for support that is above the threshold is Frozen Heart, and that is SUPER conditional.
